name: LessonsCentral
tag_list: education, learn, learning, teach, teaching, student, teacher, instructor, coach, music-lessons, coaching
overview:
LessonsCentral.com manages the relationship between students and instructors.

The site is free to use for everyone. Instructors can create a searchable profile to attract new students. The site uses an interactive scheduling calendar for each instructor. Instructors can create availability for students to schedule on, or they can schedule lessons themselves. They can also use the payment center to send invoices and collect online payments. There are many other features for instructrs to help them mange their business.

Students can easily browse a variety of categories to find their next instructor! Once they have chosen an instructor, they can message them, schedule lessons online, and more!
